channel.title: Go Baby Go - Northern California
channel.description:
Hello,
Mom of an 18 month old who needs some mobility help, and we were recommended Go Baby Go from our PT. I'm not really sure where to start with getting my LO set up, but we live in the Sacramento area in Northern California.
Not sure where or how to start.
I'd love to be connected to a nearby chapter (or as nearby as we can get). I think between my husband and myself we could always try to build ourselves too.
Thank you!

item.title: Go Baby Go - Northern California
item.dc:creator: Pete-from-POP
item.description:
Contacts In Your Area | GoBabyGo! … this is hella old but there’s a chance that even if the person/chapter no longer active they might know who they’ve “passed the torch” to. If you can’t find anyone to help local i’d be willing to try and help remotely

Best of luck,
Pete

Read full topic
